attributes.action: Not allow BBC Trust members to hold two or more jobs.
attributes.additional_details: Most people would be happy with a £100 000 salary but not a BBC trust member. For Example, Diane Coyle, is also a member of the labour party and a political aide to the labour party whilst a Trust member as a member of the Competition Commission. I don't know how a BBC Trust Member is impartial whilst being a member of a political party. If they were a member of the Conservative Party, labour would be kicking up a fuss.
